SUBMISSION.lab_name: Hajime Hirase Research Unit, Brain Science Institute, RIKEN
SUBMISSION.submission_comment: Postnatal five weeks, male Long Evans rats. Hippocampal CA3 miRNA profiling was done separately in the left and right hippocampal CA3. About 90% of the read sequences were described in miRBase (release 15), the rest contained some novel miRNA candidates.
SUBMISSION.TITLE: miRNA profiling of bilateral rat hippocampal CA3 by deep sequencing
